casebody.data:
The PPW ROYALTY TRUST DATED SEPTEMBER 27, 1989, By and Through Donald G. PETRIE, its Trustee, et al., petitioners,
v.
George A. BORTON, et al. No. 16-1031. Supreme Court of the United States April 17, 2017.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eighth Circuit denied.
